CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 15 reads: "2. Tin-T-Set beauty operators worked endlessly demonstrating hair tinting and Pink Ice facials. Shown here are Clay White, Mrs. Lavere Hord and Mrs. Elizabeth Barrow."
TitMainTitle: Lavere Hord and Clay White demonstrating Tint-N-Set and Pink Ice beauty products in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
